translations: n．行话，术语：特定行业、领域或群体中使用的专业词汇或短语。
· I don't understand the technical lingos used by computer programmers.
我不懂计算机程序员使用的技术行话。

sentences.sentence: A mere 5 per cent of the global population speak the rest and two thirds of these lingos are in danger of extinction.
sentences.translation: 仅有5%的人说剩下的语种，其中有三分之二都濒临消亡。
